ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to remember that the trade skills arn t all dependent on each other like they will be in the future... I m sure pottery will have its uses, just like
ygData.messageBody:
You have to remember that the trade skills arn't all dependent on each other like they will be in the future... I'm sure pottery will have its uses, just like baking ect will eventually.. You'll just have to wait. I play a gnome and i'd love to be able to tinker, but tinkering is totally bugged... So i'll just have to wait, and i accept that... It leaves something to look forward to. Untill then tinkering is basicly useless+ACE-
Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-
